content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
String Concatenation
To concatenate, or combine, two strings you can use the + operator.
Example
Merge variable
a
with variable
b
into variable
c
:
a = "Hello"
b = "World"
c = a + b
print(c)

Example
To add a space between them, add a
" "
:
a = "Hello"
b = "World"
c = a + " " + b
print(c)

★
+1
